official_title: A bill to amend title 23, United States Code, to establish national child passenger restraint requirements.

summary.text: (Reporeted to House from the Committee on the Judiciary with amendment, H. Rept. 98-491) Establishes national child passenger restraint requirements for motor vehicles. Prohibits the Secretary of Transportation from approving Federal-aid highway projects in any State which does not comply with such requirements.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 23, United States Code, to establish national child passenger restraint requirements.
